channel.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
channel.description:
Imagine this, your only just going into 6th grade, its your first time switching classes right? It's supposed to be fun with light streaming through the window, theres fun little math assignments to do, so your walking to your classroom everything seems normal, you open the door, it resembles a dark, dank, and dusty jail cell, with an UGLY teacher, that sais things like "holy talito that's licaty split on a ham's head", or "goose chase within a leg of a bear!",(those are just examples of my math teacher). She has a thing she hangs around her neck that enhances what she sais into a loud speaker all around the room.
Good thing that was only my math teacher, and i could just say," well math 87 is to hard, can i go to the at level math book, with a different teacher?", and they say (have to say)," yes".
So it's all pretty good now, my homeroom teacher teaches my math to so i don't even have to change classes.

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Lawl. I’m in 9th now. My 6th grade math teacher… Well… I’m glad he didn’t make it for more than a year… His name was Mr. Johnson. He slapped girls on the ass for doing there homework (why he was fired). If we didn’t do his homework we couldn’t get more than a 54 F in that class. He said homework was his only feeling, that we 6th graders broke all the rest of them. It was hellx7

Read full topic
item.source: The worst teachers you've ever had

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Having a teacher that you don’t get on with will fuck up your grades. Last year i was predicted A* for my maths gcse, was in top set with the most lovliest teacher.

This year im predicted a D because of the dumb maths teacher i have had. Well 3 actually, i managed to get all 3 fired. Although this past year i’ve had the most wonderful english teacher and my grades have gone from a D to a B in english.

Just shows that it mostly depends on what teachers you have if you do well.

Read full topic
item.source: The worst teachers you've ever had

item.dc:creator: @Cunit Cunit
item.description:
@Cunit wrote:

me and my 2 friends the whole year annoyed my math teacher he said “The gloves are off” and we started shitting up laufing then he said we were the worst students he has ever had and he would beat our asses if he could…We laufed more and got suspended for 3 days for severe disrespect tourds teachers

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:18, topic:136338”][quote author=gikid link=topic=187837.msg1698410#msg1698410 date=1187992222]

Well luckily I think I found the cause of the alopecia and it should stop forever now.

Just out of curiosity, what was it?

It’s a rather personal issue. Took a lot of exploring my own mind just to find the cause.

Because generally Alopecia is caused by stress, or being nervous about something. I wasn’t nervous, and didn’t have any stress so I had no clue what the cause was until pretty recently.

Drugs… :o
[/quote]

Lol nope. It’s nothing anyone would know, don’t wanna talk about it. Kthx.[/quote]
It’s about a girl isn’t it, the link that kmb posted in the other topic got you all embarrased, cmon just own up kthxxxxxxxx

Read full topic

item.source: The worst teachers you've ever had

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Having assholes for teachers is probably the only part of the education system that makes sense. Screw algebra, nothing teaches you better for the real world then a real prick.

Of course, I’ve had my share of asshole teachers too. Mainly my english and media study teacher last year. I have alopecia areata which is a condition where your immune system basically attacks your hair follicles causing it to fall out. Normally I have a full head of hair, but once a year or so it’ll act up for about a month and then go away. I’ll have little bald patches. So for this, I wear a hat.

For some reason my mom insists that all my teachers know about it, dunno why. So of course right when I go to his class for the first time he introduces a new rule. No hats. Ok not that big of a problem since It was on the back of my head and I was at the very back of the class(along with many others…). “Nope, Don’t like the seating plan. Jamie move up front please.” And I was the only one that got moved. So here I am, sitting there embarrased as hell as everyone can see my bald spots. And I know he did this on purpose. He hates me and no one else. My mom probably pissed him off somehow. Well luckily I think I found the cause of the alopecia and it should stop forever now.

Read full topic
item.source: The worst teachers you've ever had

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

I remember in 4th grade we had this horrrriblllleee teacher, my friends family member died, and he came to school the next day all sad and what not. She told him just because your family member died doesn’t make you special! lol. She also would make fun of us, like made fun of my hair when I got a haircut. We ended up getting her fired

Read full topic

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Well 2 yeard we had a a substitute for LOTE, this is what happened.

We were studying and talking pretty loud, she says quite the first time, we are ALL SILENT. Then out of random she throws her chair at the back of the room and scares this kid so he fell out of his seat, then she started screaming and brought the coordinator in, and she was like THESE KIDS ARE FUCKING RUDE we were just laughing.

Never seen her again, I laughed my head of for a week, you should of seen the poor guys face when she scared the shit out of him.

Read full topic

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

Lol, in grade 6, we had camp, and we had a really good teacher (This is a funny story, he is nice but this is really funny). In our cabins, there was 2 sides. On our side, the lights were out. All you hear is somebody SCREAM AND LEAP FROM HIS MATRESS TO ANOTHER PERSONS MATRESS, IM GOING TO BUM RAPE YOU!!! Lights turn on. teacher works in. ITS 4 IN THE MORNING! GO TO SLEEP! IF YOU SAY ANOTHER WORD YOUR COMING TO SLEEP WITH ME! Can you guess why we shutted up? :o

I once had a teacher. And if you sneezed in class. She would send you to the office.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

MuNkY:

i had a p.e teacher who was missing a testicle and held it against us, he was also bald. and one of his eyes was stained red. i wz scared. that year i broke the 100m sprint record…he was walking towards me just before the race started.

i lold in irl

my scariest one my teacher made fun of me and ask if i forgave him, and he pulled out a bat

item.title: The worst teachers you've ever had
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

The school I attended for 9th grade didn’t require for us to take an “Integrated Science” class, so I would selected to take Biology 1. Now I’m a sophmore going to a new school. And since this new school requires that all students take an “Integrated Science” class, I’m stuck in an all freshman class. Talk about a bummer. The only good thing about it is that i can hook up with all the hot, easy freshman girls that are in my science class. Freshman girls love having a boyfriend in a higher grade, which is good for me. I can teach all of them alot about “human anatomy” if you know what I mean.

Read full topic
